title: This is what i am banned for lol
body:
Game 1
In-Game

bb we can glow: you and your buddy
bb we can glow: ONE?
bb we can glow: LOL
bb we can glow: check replay bro

bb we can glow: no point of playing with this people

Game 2
In-Game
bb we can glow: idk wtf are you waiting for?
bb we can glow: you want fcking kaisa jg to engage in ? are you mentally ill
bb we can glow: you have perfect combo and you are waiting for me to go in first i am never comming mid agian
bb we can glow:  cant go in first
bb we can glow: stfu
bb we can glow: AHAHAHAHHAHAHA ima litearlly kms
bb we can glow: do you see this rune? do you know what it does
bb we can glow: yo report me all day you tilted me from my first gank and you bassicly caused this,you trolled on that gank case closed go repo
Post-Game
bb we can glow: xdd
bb we can glow: REPORT ME
Game 3
Pre-Game
bb we can glow: no
bb we can glow: probably yas mid

In-Game
bb we can glow: BAIT HIM

bb we can glow: as kaisa

bb we can glow: 1:4
bb we can glow: how is that gankable
bb we can glow: you are reported udde
bb we can glow: we can easily win this but you cant push your lane all time
bb we can glow: LMAO
bb we can glow: alright dude you are mtued bye
bb we can glow: they have to stop herald
bb we can glow: we do drake
bb we can glow: 90 farm raenekton
bb we can glow: k xd
bb we can glow: why did you leave
bb we can glow: you are so bad bro
bb we can glow: he wants to take blue lol
bb we can glow: XD
bb we can glow: you have renekton in your name
bb we can glow: broo
bb we can glow: xdd
bb we can glow: and you cant win lane against yasuo
bb we can glow: ahahahha
bb we can glow: that is sad
bb we can glow: jebeni debil
bb we can glow: mali

bb we can glow: just rep this rene

bb we can glow: IF WE ONLY HAD TOP TO TANK THEM
bb we can glow: ez win
bb we can glow: when i get infinity ez win
bb we can glow: stfu
bb we can glow: trololing
bb we can glow: you are pure troll
bb we can glow: nothing else
bb we can glow: WH ARE YOU GOING BACK WHEN I AM PINGING YOU TO GO IN
bb we can glow: why
bb we can glow: we can
bb we can glow: i just took down half of his p
bb we can glow: hp
bb we can glow: i didnt even utl
bb we can glow: what are you so scared of
bb we can glow: XD
bb we can glow: xdd
bb we can glow: yeah this ryze is good
bb we can glow: and ekko
bb we can glow: cuz you are forced to farm and you are p ushed in
bb we can glow: they are winning so he is nto
bb we can glow: why you didnt ult earlier i would survive
bb we can glow: ashe...
bb we can glow: bruh gg we tried
Alright can somone pls tell me for what am i banned for? Sure i typed a lot but it was mostly game releated i dont see one insult in those chat logs.
Did i spam ? It looks like it cuz i typed a lot but i didnt i was mostly discussing things about game other temmates were typing a lot too
Did i flame? I didnt insult anyone,worst thing i did was pinged somones farm.Keep in mind that in most of those games i was target of flame and not by pinging farm like big time insults and i would write alright muted bye and mute the person and not be toxic and trust me i could be but i avoided and muted person and wasnt toxic.
If you look at the chat logs you will just see that 90% things that we were wrote here were game releated.can somone pls explain me what law of summoner code did i broke lmao cuz this is just unfair.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=bb we can glow,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AOWHELpN,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-22T09:44:05.764+0000)
>
> Game 1
> In-Game
> bb we can glow: pls surr this
> bb we can glow: go ff this
> bb we can glow: just ff it
> bb we can glow: ff it
> bb we can glow: just go next i said it 10 min ago

Giving up.


> bb we can glow: just shut up
> bb we can glow: stfu

Unsportsmanslike behaviour. 


> bb we can glow: you want fcking kaisa jg to engage in ? are you mentally ill

Indirectly insulting your teammates as mentally ill.


> bb we can glow: yo report me all day you tilted me from my first gank and you bassicly caused this,you trolled on that gank case closed go repo

Blaming teammates for your tilt, calling them trolls.

> bb we can glow: you are so bad bro

Unsportsmanslike behaviour. 


> bb we can glow: and you cant win lane against yasuo
> bb we can glow: ahahahha
> bb we can glow: that is sad

Laughing at your own teammates for losing a lane (unsportsmanslike).

> bb we can glow: jebeni debil
> bb we can glow: mali
> bb we can glow: napusi mi se kurca

Google Translator: "_Fucking idiot. Suck my dick_" - insults, harassment.

> bb we can glow: just rep this rene
> bb we can glow: rep top

Report-calling

> bb we can glow: IF WE ONLY HAD TOP TO TANK THEM

Blaming teammates.

> bb we can glow: stfu

Unsportsmanslike behaviour.

> bb we can glow: trololing
> bb we can glow: you are pure troll
> bb we can glow: nothing else

Calling other teammates trolls. 

And various other reasons I didn't point out as I am quite unsure how much the system takes these into account. Dude, you don't need to tell them all the time "muted, bro, lololo bye muted" - JUST MUTE THEM and focus on the game.

> Game 1

you're the poster summoner for what giving up is (*whispers* which is against the rules)

>bb we can glow: jebeni debil
bb we can glow: mali
bb we can glow: napusi mi se kurca

if you are under the impression that riot only understands english, you are mistaken

if you had a previous punishment before this game, the ban is deserved. and those two things i refferenced are not the only problems.

Lmao that insult was on serbian towards my best friend who was premade in that game,we flame each other a lot as a joke nothing serious thats why its written on serbian so no one finds it insulting.That is an actual insult and i could accept that being bannable but it was towards my friend and it was nothing serious i assure you in that.Nothing else is bannable in my opionon.
Giving up is not against rules thats why there is surrender button they were in our base one person was afk and it was clearly lost game they didnt want to surr just to waste time.I can write "ff it" when game is clearly lost.

> [{quoted}](name=bb we can glow,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AOWHELpN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-22T10:10:07.875+0000)
>
> thats why its written on serbian so no one finds it insulting.

Wanna have fun with your friend? Fine, feel free to write it in the private chat - but as soon as it appears in the teamchat everyone can read it. 

> Giving up is not against rules thats why there is surrender button they were in our base one person was afk and it was clearly lost game they didnt want to surr just to waste time

Report Option: _ "Negative Attitude"_ (Griefing,** giving up**, putting other players down or being negative about the game)

As i said thats why i wrote it in serbian so no one understands,telling somone to ff when game is clealy lost is not bananble.why would i waste my time on a game thats gonna now (if we ff) or wait another 5 min so they can destroy our nexus.So everytime when somone says can we surrender this he should be banned? Lmao nice logic buddy. D:::

> [{quoted}](name=bb we can glow,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AOWHELpN,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-22T10:23:08.595+0000)
>
> As i said thats why i wrote it in serbian so no one understands

I can't even count anymore how often I got insulted in my mother-tongue because people thought I can't understand -, and therefore won't report them. It's a common tactic and Riot can't excuse this as "Well, you told us it was towards your friends, so everything is gucci". **We don't know for 100% if you are telling the truth or not.**

> So everytime when somone says can we surrender this he should be banned? 

No, I don't know how much Riot takes this into account - I wrote it as it's a valid "report option" provided by themselves. You can ask the support how sensitive they are regarding this topic.

>So everytime when somone says can we surrender this he should be banned?

there's a difference between asking about a surrender and harassing your team to do it because you have better things to do.

>Lmao that insult was on serbian towards my best friend who was premade in that game,we flame each other a lot as a joke nothing serious thats why its written on serbian so no one finds it insulting.That is an actual insult and i could accept that being bannable but it was towards my friend and it was nothing serious i assure you in that.

you two are not the only serbians in the game. if you want to pass insults back and forth with your friend because that's your kind of humour, do so in voice chat.

>Nothing else is bannable in my opionon.

you're entitled to have an opinion, however riot doesn't share it

Julevi has already listed why that is

>Giving up is not against rules thats why there is surrender button

yes it is. it's literally the first report option from the end game screen. 

the surrender button is there in case everyone is in favour of giving up, it is not the same as you spamming the chat that the game is lost and you personally no longer wish to play, regardless of what the rest of your team preffers at the time

Was this a 14-day-ban, any punishments before? 

But besides that: you broke several times the TOS and showed negative behaviour in-game. Please reflect your own behaviour a bit more, I can't truly believe that you see this chat-logs and think: _"I did nothing wrong!"_

This is 14 day ban,one chat restric before
Why you didnt ping it then?Where is that toxicity you talk about mate?I know when i am toxic,but in this situation nah i cant accept you thinking i am toxic.most of the chat is game releated and me asking a person why you didnt stun somone when i was about to gank ? Is that toxic these days lmao? I dont think i was toxic in this chat logs sorry,and i am sure you would change your mind when you would see the whole chat but whatever you do you

>most of the chat is game releated

oh? is this game related too?

>bb we can glow: jebeni debil
bb we can glow: mali
bb we can glow: napusi mi se kurca

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Lmao that insult was on serbian towards my best friend who was premade in that game,we flame each other a lot as a joke nothing serious thats why its written on serbian so no one finds it insulting.That is an actual insult and i could accept that being bannable but it was towards my friend and it was nothing serious i assure you in that.Nothing else is bannable in my opionon.

> [{quoted}](name=bb we can glow,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AOWHELpN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-22T10:03:53.576+0000)
>
> Why you didnt ping it then?

How can I ping something on the boards? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
 I dedicated a whole other comment to your chatlog.

> i am sure you would change your mind when you would see the whole chat but whatever you do you

Hell nah, things like that barely change my mind. I saw what you WROTE and this is enough for me - I don't care if they provoked you or whatever you wanna tell us - you always have the choice to control your own behaviour.

> [{quoted}](name=bb we can glow,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AOWHELpN,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-22T09:44:05.764+0000)
>
> Did i spam ?

Not really, no.

> [{quoted}](name=bb we can glow,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AOWHELpN,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-10-22T09:44:05.764+0000)
>
> Did i flame?

Nonstop, yes. Constantly harassing your teammates about their performance, going on and on about how you've given up, and making offensive remarks (even if it's in Croatian  - yes, I have Google, thanks) is against the rules. Fortunately for you, all you have to do to avoid future punishments is stop this misbehavior, regardless of whether you recognize it as such.
How do you even make time to actively play around the map, when you're typing that much into chat. Do you have a twin sitting side by side with you, and a second keyboard plugged in or something.

tbh i've seen worse

if you lack entertainment for the day, i can link you an example
